page.description: Skip until text matching string is found. Return text we scanned over.
page.syntax: Text as C = ScanToString as C(characters as c)

argument.name: Text
argument.description: The text between the starting and ending offset positions.

page.discussion: The <StringScanner>.ScanToString() function moves the offset to the beginning of Find_Text and returns the text between the starting and ending positions of the offset.
page.example: dim scanner as P dim txt as C txt = <<%text% This is wonderful prose written by a technical writer of great merit. %text% scanner = stringscanner.create(txt) ? scanner.ScanToString("writer") = This is wonderful prose written by a technical ? scanner.GetToOffset() = This is wonderful prose written by a technical ? scanner.getremainder() = writer of great merit.
